title: Kept Safe (6C111)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, place 2 [Shire] tokens here. Response: If an unbound Hobbit is about to take a wound, discard this condition or remove a [Shire] token from here to prevent that wound.
Rarity:	C
